roleset.name: imagine
roleset.note: ENVISAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'envisage' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 29.2. (from envisage.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The fascist concept of corporatism envisaged an ``organic'' society in which citizens were spiritually and morally unified, and prepared to sacrifice themselves for the nation.
example.arg: an ``organic'' society in which citizens were spiritually and morally unified, and prepared to sacrifice themselves for the nation

example.name: with attribute?
example.text: Mary envisaged John as an idiot.
